query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `unified_webhook_logs` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
	`webhook_config_id` int NOT NULL,
	`event_type` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
	`event_title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`event_message` text,
	`event_data` json,
	`severity` enum('info','minor','major','critical') DEFAULT 'info',
	`source_type` varchar(50),
	`source_id` int,
	`request_payload` text,
	`response_status` int,
	`response_body` text,
	`status` enum('pending','sent','failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
	`sent_at` timestamp NULL,
	`error_message` text,
	`retry_count` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`processing_time_ms` int,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_unified_webhook_log_config` ON `unified_webhook_logs` (`webhook_config_id`);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_unified_webhook_log_event` ON `unified_webhook_logs` (`event_type`);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_unified_webhook_log_status` ON `unified_webhook_logs` (`status`);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_unified_webhook_log_created` ON `unified_webhook_logs` (`created_at`);
